title: Great Scott eyes 2027 reopening after go-ahead from Boston’s zoning board
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Local News After being rescheduled from July, the Great Scott plan passed the Zoning Board of Appeals last week.
Allston Live Management LLC ShareSend this article to your social connections.
Fans of Great Scott showed up strong for the music venue’s redevelopment plans at last Tuesday’s meeting of the Boston Zoning Board of Appeal.

title: Boston Sports Club members will share in nearly $4 million restitution payment
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Business The former CEO has been ordered to pay up after charging members when the gyms were closed in April 2020.
The Boston Sports Club in Somerville's Davis Square in July 2020.

title: 2 South Shore beaches closed after white shark-seal ‘interaction’
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Local News A photo shared by Plymouth police on Facebook showed the aftermath of the attack off of Manomet Point.
By Madison Lucchesi September 15, 2025 | 9:54 AM Less than a minute to read 1Share ShareSend this article to your social connections.
Two Plymouth beaches are closed after a white shark attacked a seal, police said.

title: In biggest start of his Red Sox career, ace Garrett Crochet keeps Boston afloat in playoff race
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Red Sox “As we're nearing the end here, I don't want to have any regret on my mind here in a couple weeks.
" Garrett Crochet struck out 12 Yankees over six innings of work on Sunday.

title: 3 arrested at Burlington ICE office trying to deliver supplies to detainees
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News The ICE Boston Field Office is an office building now doubling as a detention center with multiple allegations of poor conditions.
Burlington, MA- 6/26/25- The ICE Boston Field Office at 1000 District Ave in Burlington, MA is currently doubling as an immigrant detention center.

title: Red Sox deliver early knockout punch with 6-run inning to salvage series with Yankees
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Red Sox “Put up six-spot — feels like a million with Crochet going.

title: Mike Vrabel defends Patriots kicker Andy Borregales after another shaky outing vs. Dolphins
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Patriots “You’ve got to have a lot of confidence in him, and I do have a lot of confidence.
